amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the Federal Transit Administration's Rapid Growth Area Transit Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for the Federal Transit Administration's Rapid Growth Area Transit Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Gosar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
